refentryinfo.title: Support scripts for releasing and CI environemnts

refnamediv.refpurpose: Support scripts for releasing and CI environemnts and handling deb and rpm repos.

para.screen: jss-debrepo-signcheck(1) ............ deb repo sign check jss-debrepo-update(1) ............... resigning packages and update deb repos jss-html-validator(1) ............... recursive html validator jss-jenkins-backup(1) ............... basic and simple jenkins backup jss-rpmrepo-update(1) ............... update rpm repos with default deleting policy and resigning
